body.p:
Greenville Ky
July 19 1861
Honl B Magoffin
Dear Sir

In May 1860 I confessed Judgment in the Muhlenberg Circuit Court for $60. fine for Keeping a Tipling house, Several men came into my store and drank upon high honer I never recd a dime -- but the commonWealth Witnessses, Was against me -- and preferd letting Judgment go_ You gave me a respite. I have Since petitioned Your Excellency to remit the fine I have not heard from you, please be so kind as to give me a discharge of ballance Still due_

I am your Obt Servant
N Myers

Muhlenberg Cir Ct.
$60 } Tipling
N. Myers
